page.title: 16Education<library at school>
page.content: In Broadwindsor school we have a library.It is full of interesting books.We have a colour code to help us find the books we are looking for.I am a library monitor with Ruth,Nicola and Andrew.We are supposed to tidy the library often, but we tidy it rarely. We keep mathematics equipment in there.There is a table in there, so that you can have a quiet read.By the library is the kitchen.It is separated from the library by a big brown curtain.People choose reading books from the library. I think that we are very lucky to have a library with so many interesting books.
